LanguageData.Antimatter.label: AntiMatter
LanguageData.Antimatter.description: AntiMatter in the form of anti-atoms is one of the most difficult materials to produce. AntiMatter in the form of individual anti-particles however, is commonly produced by particle accelerators and in some types of radioactive decay.
LanguageData.MagneticMaterial.label: Magnetic Material
LanguageData.MagneticMaterial.description: An advanced combination of strong magnetic materials. Creation of such material is beyond the fabrication skills of anyone but an electromagnetic physicist.
LanguageData.BiosyntheticMaterial.label: BioSynthetic Material
LanguageData.BiosyntheticMaterial.description: BioSynthetic Material is an advanced, high ductility material.
LanguageData.Hexcell.label: HexCell
LanguageData.Hexcell.description: A compact energy storing device. It is generally used for powering advanced weaponry or shock absorbers in powered armor.
